Text: Have a Passion For WritingIMAGE NCI Marketing Web Alert IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE We GUARANTEE That a Top Editor Will Read Your Manuscript IMAGE We are pleased to announce this unprecedented opportunity for aspiring authors Want to learn more Click Here IMAGE Brought to you by Penguin Putnam Inc one of the largest publishing companies in the world Writing And Publishing The Inside Story is an Internetbased writing course taught by over of todays most influential writers editors and publishing professionals Nowhere else can you learn from such renowned authors including Kurt Vonnegut Tom Clancy Nora Roberts Amy Tan and many more Learn how to begin and how to find your voice Discover how to find an agent and submit your manuscript Learn everything you need to know about the business of publishing A Penguin Putnam Inc editor will read your work Learn at your own pace any time anywhere Class is always in session At your request youll even receive WRITTEN feedback from some of the industrys best editors Writing and Publishing The Inside Story also includes a FREE CDROM that provides broadbandquality access from a standard dialup connection IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE Copyright InsideSessions You are receiving this special offer because you have provided permission to receive third party email communications regarding special online promotions or offers If you do not wish to receive any further messages from Network Commerce please click here to unsubscribe Any thirdparty offers contained in this email are the sole responsibility of the offer originator Copyright Network Commerce Inc
